frame.name: Prominence
frame.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Entity</fen> stands out perceptually in comparison to other members of its type.
<ex><fex name="Entity">Pilot Mountain in NC</fex> <m>is</m> <fex name="Degree">very</fex> <t>prominent</t>.</ex>
<ex>First, from the Saturday images, the most <t>prominent</t> <fex name="Entity">feature</fex> is a sharp spike emerging from the tailward side of the nucleus.</ex>
<ex>I was left with a deep and <t>conspicuous</t> <fex name="Entity">scar</fex> (about 10cm long) which felt uncomfortably tight and itchy.</ex>
</def-root>

FE.name: Entity
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Entity</fen> for which the saliency <fen>Attribute</fen> is appropriate and under consideration.
<ex> If you are asked to search for the plus sign with red-vertical and green-horizontal elements, <fex name="Entity">all the red and green plus signs</fex> may seem to <m>become</m> <t>salient</t>.</ex>
</def-root>

FE.name: Attribute
FE.definition:
<def-root>The feature of the <fen>Entity</fen> which is under discussion, namely perceptual salience.
<ex>The diagram, (a frequency distribution chart) shows a <fex name="att">prominently</fex> <t>conspicuous</t> region of stars that extend from the extremely bright and hot stars to the faint and cool variety. </ex></def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition:
<def-root>A modifier expressing the deviation of the prominence from the norm or from the value for another <fen>Entity</fen>.
<ex>The gobies (the family Gobiidae) are not a <fex name="Degree">very</fex> <t>conspicuous</t> part of the fish fauna in most of. the Mekong Basin.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Time</fen> during which the <fen>Entity</fen> is in the state of having a particular salience.
<ex>The affection for American culture seemed more <t>prominent</t> <fex name="tim">last year</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Circumstances
FE.definition:
<def-root>Some specification of the circumstances under which the <fen>Entity</fen> has a particular degree of prominence.
<ex>Europa is also <t>prominent</t> <fex name="cir">at a distance of 25000 km</fex> and Io is visible in the distance.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE refers to the location where the <fen>Entity</fen> has a prominence of some <fen>Attribute</fen>. </def-root>

lexUnit.name: quiet.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: not flashy, noticeable, or eventful.
